sys_remote_update_set.description: Update set for custom loading spinner on Cloud User Portal.
sys_remote_update_set.name: Custom Loading Spinner

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_ea61ab42db38a3402bc2d311ce9619f7
sys_update_xml.payload: customc.include-loader { position: fixed; top: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; opacity: 0.5; background-color: #000; z-index: 10; text-align: center; } //animation .fa-pulse { -webkit-animation: fa-spin 1s infinite steps(8); animation: fa-spin 1s infinite steps(8); } .loader-content { position: relative; display: block; margin: 160px auto; color: #fff; font-size: 1.5em; } .text-content { padding: 10px; }sp_instanceCustom loading spinner for Cloud User Portalfalsecloud-user-portal-spinner-customfalseCloud User Portal Spinner Customfalsefalsesp_widgetadmin2018-09-28 22:57:28ea61ab42db38a3402bc2d311ce9619f70Cloud User Portal Spinner Custom80d50579eb203200979aa5115206fedd80d50579eb203200979aa5115206feddsp_widget_ea61ab42db38a3402bc2d311ce9619f7admin2018-09-28 22:57:28
